title: Bug 116744: Dynamic text content type has no effect
OB: The dynamic text element's Content Type property has no effect on the displayed results.
EB:
Regardless of whether the dynamic text element's Content Type property is set to Auto, Plain, or HTML, the report consistently displays the same results. Expected results are as follows:

For Plain: I expect the literal content, including tags, to be displayed.
For Auto: I expect content 1, 2, and 3 to appear properly without HTML or RTF tags.
For HTML: I expect content 1 and 2 to appear properly without HTML tags, and content 3 to appear literally with RTF tags.
See attached report.
SR:
1. Open the report.
2. Navigate to the dynamic text element.
3. Modify the Content Type property to Auto.
4. Observe that the displayed results remain unchanged.
5. Repeat steps 3-4 for Content Type set to Plain and HTML. The results should consistently show the issue.
